virality_potential.justification: Product launch with multiple hashtags (#ckETH, #ICP, #ETH) and celebratory emojis. High engagement (725 likes, 245 retweets) suggests strong shareability within Web3 communities.

informative_value.justification: Announces a new technical capability (trustless multi-chain interactions) with multiple educational links. Direct from project's official account.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Enthusiastic tone with phrases like 'thrilled to announce' and rocket emoji. Focuses on positive technological advancement.

duration_of_impact.justification: Introduction of new blockchain interoperability feature will remain relevant for weeks as developers explore implementation.
